extension.name: Article Custom Fields Display
extension.author: Your Name
extension.description: Displays selected custom fields from current article

field.name: category_id
field.label: Category
field.description: Select categories to display fields from

field.name: custom_fields
field.label: Select Custom Fields
field.description: Choose which custom fields to display
field.query: SELECT id AS value, CONCAT(title, ' (', name, ')') AS text FROM #__fields WHERE context = 'com_content.article' AND state = 1 ORDER BY title

field.name: wrapper_class
field.label: Wrapper Class
field.description: CSS class for the wrapper div

field.name: show_labels
field.label: Show Field Labels
field.description: Show or hide the field labels
